level.heading: Surcharge on off-track winnings.
level.text: ยง 11-2301 Surcharge on off-track winnings. There shall be a surcharge of five percent of the portion of pari-mutuel wagering pools distributable to persons having placed bets at off-track betting facilities located within the city. The revenues derived from such surcharge, plus the breaks, shall be held separate and apart from any amounts otherwise authorized to be retained from pari-mutuel pools.
